Text:
My lord, I am ready! Please tell me in detail how
to make curry!

Even if I do tell you in detail... I still feel
you'll have trouble understanding...

Then I shall ask questions every step of the way!
So please answer whatever questions I may have,
my lord!

First, please tell me the ingredients you use in
curry!
Ingredients...
A-Are you at a loss for words?!

Well, there are many ways to make curry, so I don't
know where to start...

Could you give me some more details? Do we add meat
or fish...

Yeah... Depends on your personal tastes, but you can
add meat and potatoes.
Meat, potatoes, and...

I shall take note of this. I shall make something
to your desires, my lord!

And the spices. Cooking spices. This is a key
ingredient for curry.

So I boil meat, potatoes, and the spices you just
mentioned...
Hmm, I think I've got an image in mind!
It's a pretty popular food where I'm from.

If you're going as far in allowing me to cook
something so special, then it means you
must have a lot of trust in me...!

(I feel that my lord trusts me and has high
expectations of me. I need to live up to them!)
I understand the ingredients! So what do I do next?!

I put the ingredients and spices into a pot, and
boil them. Is this correct?

While just hearing the name alone made it seem difficult,
it's surprisingly simple.

Yes, first stir-fry the ingredients, then boil them
until they become a soup-like substance.

But instead of boiling it, you can also fry it
or bake it.

Fry...? Bake? Please wait a moment. The image I
had in my mind is breaking apart.

Neither the ingredients, nor the methods seems
definitive... So what is true curry?

I shall review my notes. Though I boil the meat
and potatoes after stir-frying them, I can also
bake them...

Honestly speaking, this is confusing. I can't grasp
an image of what I want curry to be.

Oh, sorry for confusing you. For now, let's boil the
meat and potatoes.
So that's the curry you crave, my lord.

Yeah. It's a typical homemade curry. That's what I
want to eat.
Typical...I see.

While my lord says typical, I wonder if he's just
being modest.

He is open-minded and strong. He is beyond worthy of
such typical food.

Honestly speaking, I have yet to understand what my
lord's wishes and feelings are.

And that is why...I wish to understand what he feels
deep inside!

Very well! I shall meet your expectations by making
you the best curry ever!
S-Sure...
Good luck. Because I'm counting on you.
You're counting on me...! I will not let you down!!!

My lord's expectations... I shall take them to heart
and use them to motivate me from now on.

Where I walk to isn't the kitchen...but Zeta's
room.
Zeta, are you there?

The moment I knock on the door Zeta pops her
head out, staring at me suspiciously.

Hmm...what're you doing at a time like this?
I was sleeping.

I'm sorry for waking you up. But I have orders from
our lord.
From our lord? That changes things.
Upon hearing his name, Zeta stands up straight.
I want you to find the finest potatoes!
H-Huh...? Potatoes, as in those vegetables you eat?

Yes. I need them to make curry. I wish to make it
in order to please Lord Shadow.

Curry...? What's that? Is that some new type of
species?

It's a food! It's also very popular in Lord Shadow's
homeland.

In Baron Kagenou’s territory...? I've never heard
that before.
But whatever. So you need those potatoes, right?

Yes. In order to make the best curry ever, I'm going
to need the best ingredients.

Yeah, yeah, you don't have to tell me. Knowing
they're orders from Shadow is enough.

Before I can explain, Zeta says she understands,
and slinks back into her room.

Though it looks like she isn't up for it,
in reality, the opposite is true.

With his full trust...I shall carry out my lord's
orders without hesitation.

I know that she will double-check in the same way if
the orders were from Alpha or myself, but..
There is no way that I'm jealous.

Like Zeta, I also wish to be of use to my lord.
Which is why I have taken this first step!

My lord, please have patience. For I shall make you
the ultimate curry!
I tighten my fist and make a vow to my lord.

I'd prefer it if you wouldn't be so loud in front of
my room.
